title: Herbes de Provence- 2.0 oz. Cube (Pack of 2)- 7 Classic, bright and bold spices blended for maximum flavor. Perfect for everyday use as well as French Specialty dishes.
features: BESTSELLER FOR 20 YEARS AND RUNNING- Herbes de Provence includes a blend of seven, high quality herbs with the added brightness of lemon, unique flavor of lavender and added punch of garlic.

ONLY THE FINEST- Victoria Taylor utilizes only the finest ingredients with a larger piece size than your average spice blend. This allows each individual ingredient to retain more natural volatile oils providing maximum flavor.
VERSATILITY- The complex flavor character of Herbes de Provence adds a sophisticated flair to chicken, pork and fish as well as vegetables.

EASY TO USE- Swirl with oil and top with some grated parmesan for a restaurant worthy dipping oil at home. Try Victoria's White Fish Fillets with Herb Bread Crumbs or her recipe for Roasted Chicken Provençal with olives using this flavorful blend.
WOMEN OWNED- business celebrating 22 years providing high quality gourmet seasonings. Gluten, Peanut and tree nut free.
description: Victoria Taylor's Herbes de Provence takes this classic seasoning blend to a whole new level of flavor. Victoria's version includes a blend of seven, high quality herbs with the added brightness of lemon, unique flavor of lavender and added punch of garlic. The complex flavor character of her Herbes de Provence adds a sophisticated flair to chicken, veal and fish as well as vegetables. Try Victoria's White Fish Fillets with Herb Bread Crumbs or her recipe for Roasted Chicken Provençal with olives using this flavorful blend.
